cast.overview: Rome, 1957. A woman, Cabiria, is robbed and left to drown by her boyfriend, Giorgio. Rescued, she resumes her life and tries her best to find happiness in a cynical world. Even when she thinks her struggles are over and she has found happiness and contentment, things may not be what they seem.
cast.title: Nights of Cabiria

crew.overview: Episodic journey of journalist Marcello who struggles to find his place in the world, torn between the allure of Rome's elite social scene and the stifling domesticity offered by his girlfriend, all the while searching for a way to become a serious writer.
crew.title: La Dolce Vita

crew.overview: Rome, 1957. A woman, Cabiria, is robbed and left to drown by her boyfriend, Giorgio. Rescued, she resumes her life and tries her best to find happiness in a cynical world. Even when she thinks her struggles are over and she has found happiness and contentment, things may not be what they seem.
crew.title: Nights of Cabiria

details.biography: Dominique Delouche was born on 9 April 1931 in Paris, France. He is a director and writer, known for La dame de Monte Carlo (1979), Nights of Cabiria (1957) and La Dolce Vita (1960).
details.name: Dominique Delouche
